venues.name: Venue 1
venues.summary: Venue 1 is a modern event space located in the heart of the city. With its versatile layout and state-of-the-art facilities, it is an ideal choice for conferences, exhibitions, and corporate events.

venues.name: Venue 2
venues.summary: Situated in a picturesque location, Venue 2 offers a charming atmosphere for weddings and special occasions. Its elegant architecture, beautiful gardens, and attentive staff ensure an unforgettable experience.

venues.name: Venue 3
venues.summary: With its spacious halls and cutting-edge audiovisual equipment, Venue 3 is perfect for concerts and performances. The acoustics are exceptional, providing an immersive experience for both artists and audiences.
